verses.verse: God, <S%G2316><s%> having in the past <S%G4181><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> to the fathers <S%G3962><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> at many times <S%G4181><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in various ways, <S%G4187><s%>

has <S%G2980><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the end <S%G2078><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his Son, <S%G5207><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he appointed <S%G5087><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of all things, <S%G3956><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> the worlds. <S%G165><s%>

His Son <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> the radiance <S%G541><s%> of <S%G1391><s%> his glory, <S%G1391><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> very image <S%G5481><s%> of <S%G5287><s%> his <S%G846><s%> substance, <S%G5287><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> upholding <S%G5342><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of <S%G1411><s%> his <S%G846><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> when he had <S%G4160><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> made purification <S%G2512><s%> for our <S%G2257><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> sat down <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> high; <S%G5308><s%>

having become <S%G1096><s%> so much <S%G5118><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> than the angels, <S%G32><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> he has inherited <S%G2816><s%> a more excellent <S%G1313><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> they have. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> to which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> did he say <S%G2036><s%> at any time, <S%G4218><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> have <S%G1080><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> become your <S%G4571><s%> father? <S%G1080><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a Son? <S%G5207><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Again, <S%G3825><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he brings <S%G1521><s%> in the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> he says, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "Let <S%G4352><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

Of <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3303><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> he says, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3303><s%> "Who <S%G3588><s%> makes <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> winds, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G3011><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G4314><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> he says, <S%G4675><s%> "Your throne, <S%G2362><s%> O God, <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> The scepter <S%G4464><s%> of uprightness <S%G2118><s%> is the scepter <S%G4464><s%> of <S%G932><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> Kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

You have loved <S%G25><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> iniquity; <S%G458><s%> <S%G5124><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> has anointed <S%G5548><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> with the oil <S%G1637><s%> of gladness <S%G20><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> fellows. <S%G3353><s%>"

And, <S%G2532><s%> "You, <S%G4771><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> laid the foundation <S%G2311><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%> The heavens <S%G3772><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G5495><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hands. <S%G5495><s%>

They <S%G846><s%> will perish, <S%G622><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> continue. <S%G1265><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They all <S%G3956><s%> will grow old <S%G3822><s%> like a garment <S%G2440><s%> does. <S%G5613><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> a mantle, <S%G4018><s%> you will roll <S%G1667><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up, <S%G1667><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they will be changed; <S%G236><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> the same. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Your <S%G4675><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> will <S%G1587><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> fail. <S%G1587><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1161><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> has he told <S%G2046><s%> at any time, <S%G4218><s%> "Sit <S%G2521><s%> at my <S%G3450><s%> right hand, <S%G1188><s%> <S%G302><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> the footstool <S%G5286><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> feet? <S%G4228><s%>"

Aren't <S%G3780><s%> they <S%G1526><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> serving <S%G3010><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> sent out <S%G649><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> do service <S%G3010><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake of those who <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G3195><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> salvation? <S%G4991><s%>
